objects.text:
• 9 PIECE KITTY PLAYSET
• 2 ADORABLE CAT FIGURES
• SPINNING PALM TREE
• INTERACTIVE ACCESSORIES

product_details.description: Welcome to your Barbie World. Build your best Barbie life! Pounce into pet paradise with this kitty tower playset. Designed with a spinning palm tree, adjustable leaf bed, and relaxing hammock  there are so many pawesome ways for the two pet kitties to play. Also included is a bag of cat food, bowls, and toys. Doll sold separately. Colors and decorations may vary.

banner_details:
The banner is a vibrant promotional ad visually segmented into four quadrants using a geometric grid layout. The top-left section features bold title text (`heading`), playful subheading text (`subheading`), and a smaller category label (`tagline`) on a white background. The top-right quadrant showcases a colorful toy image (`product_image`) placed against a soft mint green backdrop, contributing to a cheerful and inviting feel. In the bottom-left, a list of playful product highlights (`description`) is presented in white font on a deep green background. The bottom-right contains the price (`price`) in large, bold pink and a bright CTA button (`cta_button_background`, `cta`) encouraging user action. Decorative SVG elements like curved lines and colored dots provide a fun, whimsical touch across the composition.

**Color Palette:**
- Hot Pink: `#FF1493`
- Mint Green: `#bde9c9`
- Forest Green: `#027223`
- Deep Green: `#28572a`
- White: `#ffffff`
- Grey: `#707070`
product_color: This vibrant product image features a playful combination of pastel and bold colors that create a cheerful, child-friendly atmosphere. The primary palette includes Barbie Pink (#EF4C9A) on the upper structure, Mint Green (#53C3A6) for the grass-like base, and Sky Blue (#6FCFF6) for the hammock. Accents such as Violet (#B685EC) and Lilac (#D7A8FF) are used in accessories creating contrast and visual interest. The tree trunks and base blend Neutral Peach (#F4C79D) with Brown (#8B4F27), grounding the vibrant hues. The integration of color highlights ensures each component stands out while maintaining overall harmony, perfect for a fun and inviting advertisement banner.
